snippet: Legislation in Mexico promoted by major tequila and mezcal producers would limit what spirits could be called agave-based and even limit the production of some agave-based spirits.
abstract: Legislation in Mexico promoted by major tequila and mezcal producers would limit what spirits could be called agave-based and even limit the production of some agave-based spirits.

headline.main: Mexican Distillers Fight Over the Word 'Agave'
